page.title: 07 EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
Although the area is predominantly agricultural most of the employed are employed elsewhere in a variety of mainly,non-manual occupations. The largest group was Housewife(43) and the second was Retired (32).
Administration 14. Fitter 01 Accountancy 02. Home Help 02 Banking 04 Journalism 01 Book-packing 01 Medical 05 Building Trade 04 Printing 01 Computing 03 Police 03 Catering 02 Salespeople 03 Civil Service 06 Secretarial 08 Education 07 Scaffolding 01 Engineering 10 Surveying 01 Fire Service 02 Social Worker 02 Farming 10 Voluntary Work 01
169 people interviewed.
